Requirements
============

You have to install different packages to use this code 

.. tabularcolumns:: |l|c|p{10cm}|


+-----------------+---------+
|     PACKAGE     | VERSION |
+-----------------+---------+
| en_core_web_sm  | 2.3.0   |
+-----------------+---------+
| flask           | 1.0.2   |
+-----------------+---------+
| ftfy            | 5.7     |
+-----------------+---------+
| glob            | 0.6     |
+-----------------+---------+
| json            | 0.9.1   |
+-----------------+---------+
| nltk            | 3.4.5   |
+-----------------+---------+
| nl_core_news_sm | 2.3.0   |
+-----------------+---------+
| numpy           | 1.15.1  |
+-----------------+---------+
| os              |         |
+-----------------+---------+
| pandas          | 0.25.1  |
+-----------------+---------+
| re              |         |
+-----------------+---------+
| requests        | 2.22.0  |
+-----------------+---------+
| spacy           | 2.3.0   |
+-----------------+---------+
| sphinx          | 1.7.9   |
+-----------------+---------+
| sys             |         |
+-----------------+---------+
| unittest        |         |
+-----------------+---------+


You can use this web site to add lines : https://www.tablesgenerator.com/text_tables
